verses.verse: <S%G3972>Paul,<s%> and <S%G4610>Silvanus,<s%> and <S%G5095>Timotheus,<s%> to the <S%G1577>church<s%> of the <S%G2331>Thessalonians<s%> which is in <S%G2316>God<s%> the <S%G3962>Father<s%> and in the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ:<s%> <S%G5485>Grace<s%> be to you, and <S%G1515>peace,<s%> from <S%G2316>God<s%> our <S%G3962>Father,<s%> and the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>
We give <S%G2168>thanks<s%> to <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3842>always<s%> for you <S%G3956>all,<s%> <S%G4160>making<s%> <S%G3417>mention<s%> of you in our <S%G4335>prayers;<s%>

<S%G3421>Remembering<s%> <S%G89>without<s%> <S%G89>ceasing<s%> <S%G5209>your<s%> <S%G2041>work<s%> of <S%G4102>faith,<s%> and <S%G2873>labor<s%> of <S%G25>love,<s%> and <S%G5281>patience<s%> of <S%G1680>hope<s%> in our <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> in the <S%G1715>sight<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> and our <S%G3962>Father;<s%>

For our <S%G2098>gospel<s%> <S%G1096>came<s%> not to you in <S%G3056>word<s%> <S%G3440>only,<s%> but <S%G2532>also<s%> in <S%G1411>power,<s%> and in the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost,<s%> and in <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G4136>assurance;<s%> as you <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3634>what<s%> <S%G3634>manner<s%> of men we were <S%G1722>among<s%> you for <S%G5209>your<s%> sake.

And you <S%G1096>became<s%> <S%G3402>followers<s%> of us, and of the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> having <S%G1209>received<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> in <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G2347>affliction,<s%> with <S%G5479>joy<s%> of the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost.<s%>
<S%G5620>So<s%> that you were <S%G5179>ensamples<s%> to <S%G3956>all<s%> that <S%G4100>believe<s%> in <S%G3109>Macedonia<s%> and <S%G882>Achaia.<s%>

For from you <S%G1837>sounded<s%> out the <S%G3056>word<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> not <S%G3440>only<s%> in <S%G3109>Macedonia<s%> and <S%G882>Achaia,<s%> but <S%G2532>also<s%> in <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G5117>place<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> to <S%G4314>God-ward<s%> <S%G2316><s%> is <S%G1831>spread<s%> <S%G1831>abroad;<s%> <S%G5620>so<s%> that we <S%G2192>need<s%> <S%G5532><s%> not to <S%G2980>speak<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> thing.

For they <S%G846>themselves<s%> <S%G518>show<s%> of us <S%G3697>what<s%> <S%G3697>manner<s%> of <S%G1529>entering<s%> in we <S%G2192>had<s%> to you, and <S%G4459>how<s%> you <S%G1994>turned<s%> to <S%G2316>God<s%> from <S%G1497>idols<s%> to <S%G1398>serve<s%> the <S%G2198>living<s%> and <S%G228>true<s%> <S%G2316>God;<s%>

And to <S%G362>wait<s%> for his <S%G5207>Son<s%> from <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> he <S%G1453>raised<s%> from the <S%G3498>dead,<s%> even <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G4506>delivered<s%> us from the <S%G3709>wrath<s%> to <S%G2064>come.<s%>
